title: Cozy Studio Apartment
posting_body: Set in the heart of North Hollywood, The Marquee Apartments is everything you could ever want.

With proximity to everything from the sandy Southern California coastline to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of Los Angeles, your most difficult decision will be how to spend the weekends.

-Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity
-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements
-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity
-Easy access to the Hollywood Burbank Airport
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
